Why FIREandLife?

We believe the pursuit of Financial Independence should never come at the expense of living a fulfilling life today. Life happens on the path to FI—unexpected turns, challenges, and opportunities. Denying yourself joy for years isn't the answer. If you don’t know how to enjoy life now, you won’t know how to live it once you’ve reached FI. And most importantly, finding purpose beyond saving money is key to true financial freedom.
